analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#517-532) is declared view but contains assembly code

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#479-501) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#484-485)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#507-516) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#510-516)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#532-567) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#534-536)

FreezableToken.toKey uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#517-532)
	- /unique_contracts/0x3ea941988c350e2aa2b1d0de167fcc8a5e778146.sol#525-532
